Package Logic

package Logic
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Bishop
    Represents the piece Bishop.
    Board
    Represents the chess board, storing pieces and their positions on the board with a HashMap.
    ChessPiece
    Abstract class that sets common behaviours to all chess pieces.
    King
    Represents the piece King.
    Knight
    Represents the piece Knight.
    Pawn
    Represents the piece Pawn.
    Player
    Represents a player that owns the pieces of the color "white" or "black".
    Queen
    Represents the piece Queen.
    Rook
    Represents the piece Rook.
    VectorPosition
    Class that contains static methods to manipulate positions of the chess pieces.
